definition: to trust/to have confidence in/to have faith in/to rely on
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on

sentences.english: Thankfully, I have a trusted seller in Shenzen.
sentences.chinese: 还好，我在深圳有个可信赖的卖家。

sentences.english: In addition, the reliance is the deve…
sentences.chinese: 信赖是侵权法在现代社会的新发展。

sentences.english: Backtracking line search is carried out when the trust region trail step fails.
sentences.chinese: 当信赖域试探步失败时我们进行回溯线搜索。

sentences.english: This praise and confidence smote Dobbin's heart very keenly.
sentences.chinese: 这样的夸奖和信赖弄得都宾十分不好意思。

sentences.english: With your trust, Zhangjiajie China Travel Service will enjoy a better tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 有你们的信赖，张家界市中旅的明天会更好。

sentences.english: We give a quasi-Newton algorithm with nonmonotonic trust region methods for nonlinear equations.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一类解非线性方程的非单调信赖域的牛顿算法。

sentences.english: Ultimately, the most trusted source of information is the bettor himself.
sentences.chinese: 最终，最值得信赖的信息来源是投注者本人。

sentences.english: But they also have a purpose that people can believe in.
sentences.chinese: 但它们还有一个人们可以信赖的目标。

sentences.english: Cars known for dependability will guarantee parts for as many as 70,000 miles.
sentences.chinese: 可信赖的品牌汽车可以提供7万英里的保修期限。

sentences.english: The act of vocally expressing our troubles to a trusted friend can offer instant stress-reduction.
sentences.chinese: 和值得信赖的朋友倾吐自己的烦恼可以减轻压力。

sentences.english: Because if you don’t trust yourself, you’ll regret it later.
sentences.chinese: 因为如果你不去信赖自己，今后你就会因此而懊悔。

sentences.english: In chapter 2, we mainly introduce the trust region method and some related works.
sentences.chinese: 第三章提出了一种新的带线搜索的信赖域算法。

sentences.english: This is budgeting we can believe in.
sentences.chinese: 这是一份值得我们信赖的预算书。

sentences.english: Both countries have become all-weather friends that rely on each other.
sentences.chinese: 中也两国已成为相互信赖的全天候朋友。

sentences.english: He is very honest, that's why I believe in what he says.
sentences.chinese: 他很诚笃，所以我信赖他说的话。

definition: to love and respect/love and respect
to regard sth as valuable/to think highly of (a younger person, a subordinate etc)
to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
to have faith in/to believe in/to have confidence in/to respect
to regard as important/to care about
